briefTitle: A Study to Compare IPX066 and Carbidopa/Levodopa/Entacapone (CLE) Followed by an Open-Label Safety Study of IPX066
officialTitle: A Study to Compare IPX066 and Carbidopa/Levodopa/Entacapone (CLE) Followed by an Open-Label Safety Study of IPX066 in Advanced Parkinson's Disease
summary: This is a study to compare the efficacy of IPX066 and CLE in subjects with advanced Parkinson's disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of "OFF" Time During Waking Hours
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 3 days of data immediately prior to the end of each 2 week treatment period
